project_overview.summary: Monopoly Dreams is a groundbreaking attraction that stands as the world's pioneer, encompassing both indoor and outdoor areas spanning an impressive 20,000 sq ft. This innovative destination boasts state-of-the-art features, including augmented reality (AR), holographic displays, and immersive 4D interactive gaming technology.

featured_image_with_text.content: We have been commissioned to design an immersive experience for the waterworks-themed zone. Our goal is to provide visitors with an experience that draws inspiration from the renowned Monopoly board game, and we achieve this by seamlessly integrating analog and digital solutions.

featured_text_1.content: We have developed a compelling storyline that revolves around the concept of waterworks, blending elements of urgency to elicit a heightened sense of excitement and engagement among the visitors.

subtitle_and_body_1.subtitle: The water works story
subtitle_and_body_1.body: Visitors play a crucial role in assisting Mr. Monopoly in maintaining the city's water supply. They are tasked to balance water levels by controlling the water valves. However, in emergency situations such as water leakage or fires, visitors must act swiftly by triggering multiple valves to prevent flooding.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.title: Interactive pipes
highlighted_content_with_gallery_1.content: Through the integration of digital wall projection and analog valve triggers, our team has curated an immersive experience that fully engages all the senses. Visitors are transported to a dynamic waterworks world where visuals spring to life, accompanied by tangible interactions that heighten the sense of realism.

highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.title: Process
highlighted_content_with_gallery_2.content: Our team maintains a close collaboration with the client, working together to craft an immersive and meticulously designed experience for visitors. We place emphasis on the development of the game storyline, installation processes, and motion to ensure that visitors have an engaging and unforgettable experience.
